titles.title: SEAM Act of 2011
Security in Energy and Manufacturing Act of 2011
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the qualifying advanced energy project credit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/15/2011--Introduced. Security in Energy and Manufacturing Act of 2011 or the SEAM Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the qualifying advanced energy project credit by allocating in 2011 $5 billion of grants or tax credit amounts to manufacturers of goods and components (other than for assembly of components) in the United States that are used in alternative energy projects.
